mapper.select: SELECT l.* FROM location l JOIN member m ON l.memberIdx = m.idx WHERE m.familyCode = #{familyCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO savedPlace (memberIdx, familyCode, placeName, latitude, longitude, address) VALUES (#{vo.memberIdx}, #{vo.familyCode}, #{vo.placeName}, #{vo.latitude}, #{vo.longitude}, #{vo.address})
INSERT INTO location (memberIdx, latitude, longitude, updateTime, address) VALUES (#{vo.memberIdx}, #{vo.latitude}, #{vo.longitude}, now(), #{vo.address})
